import { Container, Carousel, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import logo from './img/logo.svg'; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const Home = () => { const [post_id, setpost_id] = useState(0); const [post, setpost] = useState([]); //Call API: /posts useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:9999/posts') .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(data => { if (post_id == 0) setpost(data); else setpost(data.filter(p => p.post_id == post_id)); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err); }) }, [post_id]) return ( {/* { post.map(p=>(
